description:
The solar energy technology course will prepare you for a career in the fastest growing energy industry as solar energy will be the largest source of new electric capacity. 

Space required for large solar farms is abundant, combined with the increasing volatility and expense of fossil fuel and the need to reduce air pollution, solar energy growth will increase greatly in the coming years. Solar energy is a rapidly growing source of renewable energy technology.

Students will be able to apply the engineering and technical skills required to implement solar energy. Programs of study include integrating problem solving and critical thinking skills necessary for solar industry success.
title: The Solar Resource 101
